meanings.definition: The state or quality of being endless.
meanings.sent1: The endlessnesses of the desert seemed to stretch on forever.
meanings.sent2: The endlessnesses of the ocean filled her with awe.
meanings.sent3: The endlessnesses of the line at the amusement park made them reconsider their choice of ride.
meanings.sent4: The endlessnesses of time are like a vast, uncharted sea.
meanings.sent5: The endlessnesses of space are beyond human comprehension.

meanings.definition: The property of having no end or limit.
meanings.sent1: The endlessnesses of the universe boggled the mind.
meanings.sent2: The endlessnesses of the hallway made it feel like a never-ending journey.
meanings.sent3: The endlessnesses of the buffet left them wondering if they would ever reach the dessert table.
meanings.sent4: The endlessnesses of the mountain range were like a barrier to the outside world.
meanings.sent5: The endlessnesses of the forest whispered secrets of ancient times.
